content: lit mitts are fingerless mitts that are worked from charts start with a colorful latvian braid and then knit the body and thumb gusset with a light gray and dark gray repeat the latvian braid for the finger and thumb openings knit picks palette fingerling weight 100% wool yarn finnley heather mc 80 yds asphalt heather cc 76 yds fuchsia 11 yds hollyberry 11 yds error found and pattern updated on 4/14/25
